page_title: Sound of Change – Supporting Buskers Beyond The Streets
page_content: Sound of Change is the new record label, which gives buskers the opportunity to have their music recorded in a studio and listeners the world over, to help them make money beyond the streets.
page_description: The music of a busker doesn't leave the confines of a street. Sound of Change makes street music heard by listeners from all over the world. When you buy a song on this site you're tossing the busker a few coins – just like in the street.
share_description: Support street musicians wherever you are: sound-of-change.com
become_a_part_of__str_1: Music lives not just on expensive labels, but also in the streets.
become_a_part_of__str_2: Join the project and help us share the music with listeners from every
thank_you_for_supporting_str_1: Now we will need some time to process your request.
thank_you_for_supporting_str_2: We will get in touch with you very soon.
beeline_text:
A big city street, a train car or a subway crossing - the HD voice technology will let you be heard
wherever you are. You and your partner will hear each other as clearly and fully as if you were
nearby. With Beeline you don't have to listen in, you can just listen.
